name: image-dictionary
description: Japanese Image Dictionary - A visual learning tool for Japanese vocabulary

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate deploy
